name: UIImageAsset
desc: A container for a collection of images that represent multiple ways of describing a single piece of artwork.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new image asset object.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates an image asset from data in an unarchiver.

items.name: func register(UIImage, with: UITraitCollection)
items.desc: Registers an image with the specified trait collection.

items.name: func register(UIImage, with: UIImage.Configuration)
items.desc: Registers an image with the specified image configuration details.

items.name: func unregister(imageWith: UITraitCollection)
items.desc: Unregisters the image with the specified trait collection from the image asset.

items.name: func unregisterImage(with: UIImage.Configuration)
items.desc: Unregisters the image with the specified image configuration details from the image asset.

items.name: func image(with: UITraitCollection) -> UIImage
items.desc: Retrieves the variant of the image that best matches the specified trait collection.

items.name: func image(with: UIImage.Configuration) -> UIImage
items.desc: Retrieves the variant of the image that best matches the specified image configuration details.
